label: Volume Analysis
info: Wyckoff pattern.  Low spread and extremely high volume in a trending market.  Future reversal indicator.

label: Key Levels
info: The current price near a weekly support and resistance level.  Look for price action, ema and volume to determine if this stock is worth investigating.

label: Pivot Anchor
info: Use pivot point as an anchor

label: Candle Stick
info: Candle Stick Patterns.  Englufing candle or morning/evening star candle.
